title: the Good Life
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Caribbean
description: Offering an easy dining vegan cuisine experience, art work, shakes, smoothies, clothing, and herbal products. Salads, pita bread sandwiches, mushroom burgers, spinach/tomato wraps, power shakes, vegan chocolate cake, fruit juices and cooked food lunches. Dishes cost from US$5 or BBD$10. The food is healthy with international themes throughout the week. Seating is very limited but the Rastafarian atmosphere is welcoming. Previously named Aya Cafe and located in Tweedside, Bridgetown.
